short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a page of your favorite bookmarks when opening a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Indexes all bookmarks in a chosen bookmark folder and list them when opening a new tab. 

Features:
- Choose which bookmark folder to show.
- Display content in subfolders when listing root folder to get a better overview.
- Pick a custom icon or fetch one automatically from the web page.
